title: Stage Lv6-P7-S43
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: The company plans to phase out the old product line.
We need to iron out the details before signing.
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 회사는 기존 제품 라인을 단계적으로 중단할 계획입니다.
sentences.en: The company plans to phase out the old product line.
We need to iron out the details before signing.
Let's zero in on the main issues.
We will roll out the new system gradually.

sentences.kr: 예산 삭감으로 인해 프로젝트를 축소해야 합니다.
sentences.en: Budget cuts mean we need to scale back the project.
We are closely monitoring market trends.
We need to work through the issues that arose in negotiations.
We will roll out the new policy across all departments.
